name: Introduction to Archaeology
description: A basic overview of Archaeology as a field of study.

name: Introduction to Classical Archaeology
description: An introduction to Classical Archaeology and its history.

name: Archaeology of the Ancient Near East
description: An overview of the archaeological history of the Ancient Near East.

name: Classical Archaeology Field School
description: A hands-on introduction to the field of Classical Archaeology.

name: Archaeological Theory and Interpretation
description: A deeper exploration of Archaeology as a modern field of study.

name: Archaeology of the Mediterranean World
description: A closer look at the archaeological history of the Mediterranean world.

name: Advanced Classical Archaeology Field School
description: A more in-depth exploration of the field of Classical Archaeology.
prerequisites: Archaeology of the Ancient Near East
